Squawktalk was disapointed that Switchblade had left. He was having fun.

Squawktalk: Cepta, to the next room, please.

Squawktalk flies into the next room...

----- Original Message -----
From: "Jen D." <jeniff@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, April 25, 2001 1:44 PM
Subject: Re: Bad Metal


> (ooc: Cledar's cannon and Forrior's turret is kinda like G1 Megatron's, so
> if my explanation isn't good, i hope yu guys dont get lost. the beams make
> the ground explode if they hit so just dodging them would totaly help you
:)
>
>
> Cepta nodded politely and simply wated for Squawktalk to show her around.
> She didn't know who Squawktalk was, though, so he would have to introduce
> himself first. She was very nervious here, but she hoped that she'd be
> allright.
>
>
>
> Truttle and Blyer looked ahead and saw the battle at the Cybertronian Fire
> on the horizon. Truttle did a quick scan.
>
> "Well, those bases are definitely Maximal." He said through the com link.
He
> wated a few seconds while Cledar assessed the situation and then sped up
> when the order to assist the Maximals was given. The jet and the shuttle
> arrived at the battle in a matter of seconds.
>
> Blyer scanned the area, finding a suitable target, which was a large
gestalt
> fighting another gestalt. The scan on the gestalt showed that he was a
> Decepticon. Blyer armed two missiles and made the neccessary calculations
to
> allow the missiles to successfully fly the distance required. He gained a
> bit of altitude, and then a plate opened on both of his sides. A missile
> dropped out of each opening, fell a bit, and then turned on its engine. It
> quickly gained speed and flew at Surgital's side, but if the gestalt tried
> to evade it, it would follow him.
>
> While Blyer was firing at his target, Truttle landed on the ground and
> opened his hatch. Cledar, Rixer, and Furrier jumped out and into the
action.
> Hefting a very big plasma cannon across his shoulder, Cledar jogged away
> from Truttle and picked out the first Decepticon he saw. He pulled the
> trigger and a giant beam of plasma lashed out, heading for Vehement. Rixer
> ran near him, a plasma pistol in one hand and a missile launcher in
another.
> His shoulders, which looked unusually large for a bot, suddenly launched
off
> as two bee-bots to intercept any missiles that would be fired. Rixer's
> shoulders now looked normal, though still very large, and he shot two
plasma
> shots and a missile at Predator. Farrior watched his teammates start to
> fight and then transformed into a large tank. He was greyish black, and
had
> a central turret along with a few side ones as weapons. The central turret
> could shoot a concentrated big beam of plasma while the side ones could
> shoot missiles and lasers. Quickly picking out a target, he fired a large
> beam of plasma at Injector. Now that he had no more passangers, Trattle
> transformed back into robot mode. He was medium built, and mostly green
and
> blue. His two machine guns were already in his hands. Jogging toward Hell
> Beast, he fired shot after shot at the back of the Predacon's head.
